document_notes.text:
This update for wireshark fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-8250: Fixed NTLMSSP dissector crash (bsc#1229907). 
- CVE-2020-26421: Fixed USB HID dissector crash (bsc#1179933).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Crash in USB HID protocol dissector and possibly other dissectors in Wireshark 3.4.0 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.8 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file.
